text: Barry William Boehm (May 16, 1935 – August 20, 2022) was an American software engineer. He was a distinguished professor of computer science, industrial and systems engineering at the University of Southern California. He was known for his works in the area of software engineering. Boehm died on August 20, 2022 at the age of 87.Barry Boehm, a “Living Legend” in Systems and Software Engineering, Dies at 87 ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Academics from California Category:Engineers from California Category:Educators from Los Angeles Category:Scientists from Los Angeles Category:American software engineers
title: Barry Boehm
